name: Super Ultimate Pong
description:
Super Ultimate Pong is a very fun and exciting remake of this mythical Atari Game from the 70’s, PONG. But with new features and new graphics, everything changes in the game. You can still play with your friends during a one-on-one game or against an IA rival with classicals levels of difficulty (beginner, intermediate, expert).

But the real goal of this game is to beat 20 ruthless IA rivals from famous movies and guess who is the best in the world.

It’s an easy touching game but be careful because, more you go ahead in the game, more your rival is restless and fast and you’ll fail this contest.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Simply touch the screen to control the paddle.
  • Each IA rival has a different Pong Skill, concentrating on winning them.

 FEATURES

  • Simple Control
  • New graphics with colors
  • 10 new powerups to change the game
  • Challenge your friends (one-on-one) during funny games
  • Train yourself against IA rival with different levels of difficulty
  • Challenge 20 IA famous rivals from movies 
  • Experiment with a new creative new way to play Pong.
  • Challenge an endless challenge to see how many passes you can make?

Can you beat these 20 IA rivals and become the super ultimate pong master?
